mapper.insert: insert into mailtask (MailID, GroupID, UserID, Keywords, SearchArea, SearchDate, Timer, `Type`, SendMails, SendNums, ArriveNums, DenyNums, CreateTime, UpdateTime, `Status` ) values (#{mailID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{groupID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{keywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{searchArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{searchDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{sendMails,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendNums,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{arriveNums,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{denyNums,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT} )
mapper.update: update mailtask set GroupID = #{groupID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UserID = #{userID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Keywords = #{keywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SearchArea = #{searchArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SearchDate = #{searchDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Timer = #{timer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `Type` = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, SendMails = #{sendMails,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SendNums = #{sendNums,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ArriveNums = #{arriveNums,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DenyNums = #{denyNums,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CreateTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UpdateTime = #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, `Status` = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT} where MailID = #{mailID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select MailID, GroupID, UserID, Keywords, SearchArea, SearchDate, Timer, `Type`, SendMails, SendNums, ArriveNums, DenyNums, CreateTime, UpdateTime, `Status` from mailtask where MailID = #{mailID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select MailID, GroupID, UserID, Keywords, SearchArea, SearchDate, Timer, `Type`, SendMails, SendNums, ArriveNums, DenyNums, CreateTime, UpdateTime, `Status` from mailtask
